name: cc65-vice
description: An extension to unify VSCode, CC65, and VICE monitor.

scripts.clean: shx rm -r dist out || echo Done && cd 3rdparty/cc65 && make clean
scripts.c64ttf: npm-run-all checkpip && cd ./system/C64 && python3 ../../3rdparty/c64ttf/c64ttf.py -u chargen.sf-part1 -l chargen.sf-part2 -a -o ../../dist/c64.ttf || python ../../3rdparty/c64ttf/c64ttf.py -u chargen.sf-part1 -l chargen.sf-part2 -a -o ../../dist/c64.ttf
scripts.submodules: git submodule init && git submodule update || git submodule deinit --force --all
scripts.compiler:arch: npm-run-all compiler:distdir && node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); shx.config.fatal = true; const arg = process.argv; let [, arch, cross] = arg; cross = cross || ''; const archDir = '3rdparty/cc65/wrk/' + arch; const distDir = process.cwd() + '/dist/cc65/bin_' + arch; if(shx.test('-e', distDir)) { process.exit(0); } ; shx.mkdir('-p', archDir); shx.cp('-ru', archDir + '/../../src/', archDir); shx.cd(archDir + '/src'); shx.exec('make -j8 CROSS_COMPILE=' + cross); shx.exec(cross + 'strip ../bin/*'); shx.mkdir('-p', distDir); shx.cp('-ru', '../bin/.', distDir);"
scripts.compiler:base: npm-run-all compiler:distdir && shx rm -f cc65.zip && cd 3rdparty/cc65 && make -j8 && make zip && unzip -o cc65.zip -d ../../dist/cc65
scripts.compiler:on-windows: echo "You cannot build on this platform yet." && exit 1
scripts.compiler: node -e "/* Wait for finish if it's already running */ const [fs, shx, pidFile] = [require('fs'), require('shelljs'), './compiler.run']; if (shx.test('-e', pidFile)) { const pid = shx.cat(pidFile); console.log('Waiting for active process'); try { process.kill(pid, 0); } catch { console.log('Removing stale lockfile'); fs.unlinkSync(pidFile) } while(true) { try { process.kill(pid, 0) } catch { break } } console.log('Other process finished!'); process.exit(0); } ; fs.writeFileSync(pidFile, process.pid.toString());  shx.config.fatal = true; shx.exec('npm-run-all compiler:choose'); fs.unlinkSync(pidFile)"
scripts.kernal: shx mkdir -p dist/system && shx cp -ru system/. dist/system
scripts.nonjs: npm-run-all submodules && npm-run-all -p styles fontgen kernal compiler
scripts.not-extension:debug: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('./webviews.run', process.pid.toString(), 'utf8') ; require('shelljs').exec('webpack serve --config webpack.not-extension.config.js --mode development')"
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm-run-all -p tisk webpack && npm-run-all nonjs && npm-run-all test:prepublish
scripts.vscode:install: npm-run-all package && codium --install-extension cc65-vice*.vsix || code --install-extension cc65-vice*.vsix
scripts.vice:co: env-cmd --silent -f build.env sh -c 'svn checkout svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/vice-emu/code/${VICE_SVN_VERSION:-trunk}/vice ./src/__tests__/vicedir && svn info ./src/__tests__/vicedir' || svn cleanup ./src/__tests__/vicedir
scripts.vice:choose: env-cmd --silent -f ./build.env node -e "typeof process.env.VICE_DIRECTORY != 'undefined' ? process.exit(0) : process.exit(1)" && npm-run-all vice:local || npm-run-all vice:build
